疪字的基本解释

疪
bì
古同“痹”，风湿引起的病。

疪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《集韻》必至切，去至，幫。］
同“痹1”。
湿病。

疪字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　疪； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页770第17
【集韻】必至切，音閉。腳冷濕病。　又人名。【前漢·衞霍傳】雁疪為輝渠侯。【注】雁，音鷹。疪，音庇廕之庇。　又與庇同。【後漢·淸河王傳】魂靈有所依疪。　又【類篇】毗至切，音備。義同。　【類篇】或作痹。廕原字从隂，不从陰。

疪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
疪字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Boil
bì
Ancient Tong "Bi", a disease caused by rheumatism.
Boil
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Ji Yun" must be cut, go to, help. ]
Same as "Bi 1".
Wet sickness.
Boil
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Department of Sui Characters] 　疪; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 770 17
【Jiyun】It must be cut, and the sound is closed. Cold feet.　Another name. [Previous Han·Weihuo Biography] Yan Yan is Huiquhou. [Note] Goose, sound eagle. Mange, the shelter of sound.　The same with Pi. [The Legend of the King of Cheonghe in the Later Han Dynasty] The soul is dependent on it.　[Classes] Adjacent to the cut, sound prepared. The same meaning.　【Classes】or Zuobi. The original word for yin is from yin, not from yin.
